resources.string: You haven\'t added any Meal Categories yet.
No Dishes have been added in this Meal / Menu Category yet. \n\nAdd and configure Dishes in this Category so they will be available for your Guests to order.
You have no Taxes configured yet. \n\nIf any Taxes are applicable, please add and configure them. Orders placed by your Guests will not be taxed until you add and configure them here.
You haven\'t configured / added any Tables yet. \n\nYou need to configure / add Tables before you can start taking Orders in Resto.
You have no User Accounts in this User Role. \n\nChange the User Role using the dropdown below the Search Bar. Or, add a new User Account to this User Role.
There are no Menu Categories available. Please consult the Staff.
There are no Dishes available in this Category :-(
You have no Dishes added to your Cart. \n\nBrowse the Menu and add Dishes to your Cart.
